## v0.0.0

List of essential folders & files copied from `node_modules/codemirror` to `vendor/codemirror`:

_ addon/
| |_ comment/
| |  |_ comment.js
| |_ dialog/* (all files)
| |_ edit/
| |  |_ closebrackets.js
| |  |_ matchbrackets.js
| |_ fold/
| |  |_ brace-fold.js
| |  |_ comment-fold.js
| |  |_ foldcode.js
| |  |_ foldgutter.css
| |  |_ foldgutter.js
| |  |_ indent-fold.js
| |_ hint/
| |  |_ css-hint.js
| |  |_ show-hint.css
| |  |_ show-hint.js
| |_ lint/
| |  |_ css-lint.js
| |  |_ json-lint.js
| |  |_ lint.css
| |  |_ lint.js
| |_ scroll/
| |  |_ annotatescrollbar.js
| |_ search/
| |  |_ match-highlighter.js
| |  |_ matchesonscrollbar.css
| |  |_ matchesonscrollbar.js
| |  |_ searchcursor.js
| |_ selection/
| |  |_ active-line.js
|_ keymap/* (all files)
|_ lib/* (all files)
|_ mode/
| |_ css/* (all files)
| |_ javascript/* (all files)
| |_ stylus/* (all files)
|_ theme/* (all files)
